content.rendered:
A value education workshop was conducted at Central India Public School, Wardhaman Nagar Branch in Nagpur, under Smile Foundtaion’s Child for Child (CFC) programme.

The In-charge Mrs. Kazi, along with other teachers and 265 students from class 1st to 4th, participated in the morning assembly during which the session was conducted. The kids were very much engaged throughout the session and were quick to volunteer when the in-charge asked them to explain what they had understood.

“They all said we wish to send one friend to school. One child said that she understood that the world is beautiful and she must join hands with Smile Foundation to make it more beautiful”, shares Mr. Jitendra Deshmukh, part of Smile Foundation’s CFC team.
